Text: Today, the ECB has actually delivered almost everything that investors wanted. As expected, the deposit rate has been lowered to minus 0.5%.
Cause: Today, the ECB has actually delivered almost everything that investors wanted.
Effect: As expected, the deposit rate has been lowered to minus 0.5%.
Sentence: <e1>Today, the ECB has actually delivered almost everything that investors wanted.</e1> <e2>As expected, the deposit rate has been lowered to minus 0.5%.</e2>
